comment.author: 34897448@N00
comment._content: This photo is tagged with pagoda, but in fact, as you can see the city wall on the left of the photo, it's actually one of the gates to the city.

comment.author: 40843863@N08
comment._content: hey, that is not pagoda.that is the building on the city wall or Gate. could be the front gate, or in chinese 前门。
